species.name: dreepy
descriptions: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.
If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
